alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Clayton; Fayette; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 01 at 7:02PM CST until January 02 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Bitterly Cold Wind Chills Tonight... .Snow is winding down over southwest Wisconsin and should end before midnight. Bitterly cold wind chills will overspread the area tonight with values in the -25 to-35 degree range by the morning. ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of west central Wisconsin, northeast Iowa and southeast Minnesota. * WHEN...The coldest wind chill values will be towards sunrise, but very cold values will be present through the night and morning hours. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
